lines: Pamo ne minwe yandi. Icite fyo mwatemwa.
Mfumu napela. Umweo nafyonse, Kube ukwa penape.
2. Bula makasa yandi, Yacite co lefwaya.
Shiwi nalyo limbile, Limbile Mfumu yandi.
3. Bule milomo yandi, Isose shiwi lyobe;
Ne mpiya shandi shonse. Ninsha po fye nakalya.
4. Bula inshiku shandi, Ne nshita yandi yonse;
Na mano yandi yonse, Fibomfye Mfumu yandi.
5. Bula bufwayo bwandi, Bucite bube bobe;
Bulo mutima wandi, Ube cipuna cobe,
6. Bula kutemwa kwandi, Kube pankasa shobe:
Naine wine pano, Ukuti mbe obe pe.
